data.title: Admissions
data.text:
Details

Written by Manisha Gade

Category: Admissions

Published: 15 August 2024

Hits: 424

Dear Students,

Congratulations for securing admission in Vishwakarma Institute of Technology, Pune. In order to make the reporting procedure at the institute smooth, you are instructed to follow the steps given below scrupulously:-

For the convenience of the students and to avoid the rush at one campus the admission procedure will be carried out at two different Locations. The details are as under :-

Vishwakarma Institute of Technology, Bibwewadi campus

(Address : 666 Upper Indira Nagar, Bibwewadi, Pune 411 037)

Google Map Link https://maps.app.goo.gl/ypK41ys93yVyzEM19

Computer Engineering.

Information Technology.

Artificial Intelligence and Data Science.

Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence)

Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning)

Vishwakarma Institute of Technology, Kondhwa Campus

(Address : Survey No 3 / 4 Kondhwa (Budruk) Pune – 411 048)

Google Map Link : https://maps.app.goo.gl/YgwCt18AquAvARpF7

Computer Engineering (Software Engineering)

Computer Science and Engineering (Data Science)

Computer Science and Engineering (Internet of Things and Cyber Security including Block Chain Technology)

Civil Engineering.

Electronics and Tele Communication Engineering.

Instrumentation and Control Engineering.

Mechanical Engineering.

Refer the Admission Process Flow 2024-25 related to the entire admission process and follow it thoroughly.

Students are required to submit the required original documents along with three sets of

Self attested Photocopies of them. Students are strictly instructed to arrange their

Documents in the given Document Sequence. All the photocopies are required to be self

attest the student concerned.

Refer Fees Structure and the instructions given carefully. Fees payment could be done

through Offline/Online Mode. In Offline mode, Fees payment is preferred through

Demand Draft (DD). DD of an appropriate Fees amount must be drawn in favor of

“Vishwakarma Institute Of Technology”, Payable at Pune. Student should write name,

mobile number, and CET Application ID on the backside of the Demand Draft.

Fees Payment could also be done through Online modes such as Netbanking/ Debit

Card/Credit Card / UPI. Refer following instruction regarding payment through Online modes.

Take the back to back print out for Marathi and English version and sign the Anti Ragging undertaking document for Student and Parents/Guardian.

Take the print out and sign the Undertaking for Original Documents if the required essential documents are not available for submission.

The EBC Concession is available to all Open Category students as per the Government Resolution for Eligibility and income limit.

For hostel admission please contact hostel desk at the time of admission. Hostel Fees

Additional Instructions for Reserved Category students.

The students from OBC/VJ/DT/NT/SBC having income above 8 lacs are not eligible for

benefits of Scholarship/ Free ship. Refer Government Resolution for eligibility and Income Limit. Such students are required to pay the fees applicable for OPEN category. No change will take place in this matter on any grounds.

The Reserved category and Divyang students are required to give an

undertaking for Scholarship/ Freeship/ EBC/SEBC/EWS/PH Concession.

All Reserved category/EWS/EBC/SEBC and Divyang students are require to fill the online
